title: Tips for Buying the Best Macbook Pro
summary: The 13-inch Macbook Pro is the most popular version, and the one we would recommend to most people. It's not the most powerful, but it’s powerful enough for most people, and it's great for everyday use. The 15-inch version is the best option for people who need more power. The Touch Bar is only available with a Touch Bar, so if you don’t need it, you need to go with the 15-in version. The 17-inch model is the biggest, with a battery life of up to 10 hours, and is great for watching movies and TV shows. It comes in both the 13-in and the Touch Bar version.

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The MacBook Pro is one of the most popular laptops on the market, and they\u2019re great machines. But with so many different versions to choose from, it can be difficult to know which one is right for you. Do you need a Touch Bar or not? What screen size do you need? How much storage space do you need? These are all questions you need to ask yourself before buying a Macbook Pro.
If you\u2019re thinking about buying a Macbook Pro, here are some helpful tips to make sure you get the best model for your needs. The Macbook Pro comes in 13-inch, 15-inch and 17-inch screens, so that\u2019s the first thing to consider when buying one. You also want to decide whether you need an integrated GPU (not all models have them) and how much storage space you want.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

content.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("h2",null,"13-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 13-inch Macbook Pro is the most popular version, and the one we would recommend to most people. It\u2019s compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around. It\u2019s also the cheapest option, making it a great choice if you\u2019re on a budget. It\u2019s a great laptop for running multiple programs at once, with 8 GB RAM and a 256 GB SSD, and if you\u2019re a student or someone who travels a lot, this is the one we would recommend. It\u2019s not the most powerful laptop, but it\u2019s powerful enough for most people, and it\u2019s great for everyday use. It\u2019s the most reliable version too, so it\u2019s definitely worth considering if you\u2019re after a Macbook Pro."),mdx("h2",null,"15-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 15-inch Macbook Pro is the best version for people who need more power. It\u2019s a more heavyweight option, but it\u2019s great if you run heavy programs like photo editing, video editing or if you\u2019re a designer. The bigger screen size is also great for watching movies and TV shows, so if you\u2019re an avid TV binger, this one is a good option. One thing to note is that the 15-inch Macbook Pro is only available with a Touch Bar, so if you don\u2019t need a Touch Bar, it\u2019s not worth the extra money. It\u2019s also a more expensive option, so it\u2019s worth considering if you really need a more powerful laptop. It\u2019s a great option for people who run programming, design or video editing software regularly."),mdx("h2",null,"17-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 17-inch Macbook Pro is the best option for people who need a laptop for work. It\u2019s the most powerful option out of the Macbook Pros, as it has two fans to keep the laptop cool, and a giant battery life of up to 10 hours. It\u2019s also the biggest, so if portability is important to you, it\u2019s definitely worth avoiding. That said, it\u2019s the best option for people who need their laptop to run multiple programs at once, making it the best option for people who work regularly on the go."),mdx("p",null,"It\u2019s worth noting that it comes with an IGP instead of a discrete GPU, so it\u2019s not the best option for editing videos or running graphic design software. If you need a laptop for work, this is the best option, but it\u2019s worth considering if you want something more portable."),mdx("h2",null,"Touch Bar Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The Touch Bar Macbook Pro comes in both the 15-inch and the 13-inch version and costs a little more than the non-Touch Bar version. It\u2019s a good choice if you want the Touch Bar, but don\u2019t want a more heavyweight option. It\u2019s also worth noting that the 13-inch model is lighter and more compact than the 15-inch model, so if portability is important to you, it\u2019s worth considering. It\u2019s a good option for people who want to use the Macbook Pro for everyday tasks, and don\u2019t need a laptop for work. It\u2019s definitely worth considering if you want a cheap Macbook Pro, but it\u2019s worth being aware that you won\u2019t get the best performance out of the three."),mdx("h2",null,"Storage Space and RAM in the Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The Macbook Pro comes with either 128 GB, 256 GB, 512 GB or 1 TB of storage space, so if storage space is important to you, it\u2019s worth considering how much you need. 128 GB is the minimum amount of storage space needed, but if you\u2019re someone who likes to store a lot on their laptop, or if you need to regularly store files, it\u2019s worth going for the 256 GB or 512 GB option."),mdx("p",null,"The Macbook Pro also comes with 8 GB or 16 GB of RAM, so if you need more than 8 GB, it\u2019s worth considering the 16 GB option. It\u2019s important to consider what screen size you want, what version you want, and how much storage space you need to make sure you get the best model for your needs."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 5 Best AI Applications That Will Change Your Business

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`If you need proof that artificial intelligence has become ingrained in our daily lives, just look at the buzz around virtual assistants like Alexa, Siri, and Cortana. These AI helpers are no longer just for tech-savvy adults; now, kids as young as five are happily chattering away with cartoon characters like Waffle the Blue Whale or Hank the Crab whenever they need help with something.
However, AI isn\u2019t solely limited to helpful sea creatures or talking speakers. In fact, AI is being used for all kinds of purposes \u2013 from self-driving cars to replacing call center agents with intelligent chatbots. Even businesses are seeing the value in incorporating AI into their day-to-day operations. From automating processes to making data-driven decisions faster, businesses of all sizes can leverage the benefits of AI in order to improve their services and workflows.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Smartphone Usage Statistics That You Need to Know
Apple Inc: What You Need to Know!
Facebook's User Data: How the Social Media Giant Collects and Sells Our Information

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Social media is a double-edged sword. While these platforms can be wonderful tools for keeping in touch with friends and family, they also come with risks \u2014 especially when it comes to your personal data. Facebook users can now read again and again how their data was misused by the company and its partners. There are constant scandals around this subject. Social media users need to be more conscious about what they share and how they share it.
Unfortunately, most of us don\u2019t read user agreements or privacy policies until something goes wrong\u2014and that\u2019s too bad, because those documents often contain important information about how your personal information is going to be used by that service provider. In many cases, you\u2019ll see an \u201COK\u201D button beside the user agreement, meaning you must agree to continue using the app or site if you want to proceed any further.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Top 12 Amazingly Low-Cost Macbook Pro Alternatives
How Big Tech Is Changing the Way We Live and Work

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Millennials are now the largest generation of workers in the U.S., and as they advance their careers, they\u2019ll continue to reshape how and where we work. The digital age has made it possible for people to work from virtually anywhere at any time. As a result, more people are leaving the office behind and working remotely or taking up independent contracting gigs, which is why we\u2019re seeing so many young professionals ditch cubicles for coffee shops and other remote-friendly offices.
Working from home, going independent, or collaborating with coworkers online means millennials have given rise to what some have called \u201Cthe gig economy.\u201D It\u2019s also prompted a shift in the types of companies people choose to work for and what skills they need to get hired in those roles \u2014 regardless of where they do that work. If you\u2019re looking to join this world of work in 2020, here\u2019s everything you need to know:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Big Tech Companies and the Future of the Internet

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The internet is rapidly growing larger and more complex. As of June 2018, there are approximately 3.4 billion users globally, with that number continuing to grow by the day. With so many different people using the internet, it\u2019s no surprise that big tech companies have begun to thrive once again.
At its core, the internet is an exchange of information between computers. In practice, this means a website like Google can store all of its user-friendly information online and anyone who wants to access it simply needs to type in a URL or visit a site directly. However, as more people use the internet and begin interacting with various programs and applications on websites, things become slightly more complicated.
As you probably know if you browse social media sites or read news articles online frequently, there are now several different \u201Clanguages\u201D being used on websites to make them more interactive. These programming languages are known as HTML5, CSS3, JS/JavaScript, and JSON \u2013 all acronyms that stand for something but might not mean much to most users at first glance.
However, these languages make up what is known as web content management systems (WCMS). A WCMS is essentially software that allows developers to create websites of any kind without having to code each page from scratch every time they want to launch a new one.
Here\u2019s a brief breakdown of what big tech companies and the future of the internet look like today:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Your Guide to the Best Smartphone for Your Budget

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Smartphones have become an essential part of our lives. We use them for a lot more than just making calls or sending texts. Smartphones are useful for staying in touch with friends and family, for browsing the internet, for checking your email, and for keeping track of appointments.
They\u2019re also useful for streaming music, taking photos and videos, storing documents you need to access on the go, and keeping track of your fitness goals by monitoring your steps taken and calories burned.
With so many different smartphone manufacturers and models out there it can be hard to know which one is right for you. Do you want a high end phone with all the bells and whistles? Or would a cheaper option suit your needs just fine?
If you\u2019re looking to buy a new smartphone in 2019 but aren\u2019t sure where to start, read on to discover our guide to the best smartphones in 2019, broken down by budget.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 5g Will Transform the Way We Live, Work and Play

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`High-speed mobile internet is about to get a whole lot faster. The world is on the cusp of an exciting new era in wireless technology, as the rollout of fifth generation (5G) cellular networks begins across the globe.
Even though 4G LTE coverage is widespread and newer 5G networks aren\u2019t quite ready for large-scale implementation just yet, carriers around the world are already testing out pre-Release 15 5G network services. Several national operators have already begun deploying their 5G network infrastructure, while others are set to follow suit in the coming months. The race is on to lead the way in this cutting-edge technology and reap the benefits that come with it. It\u2019s a fast-moving space, so here\u2019s everything you need to know about 5G and when you can expect it to launch where you live.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Top 10 Mistakes Macbook Pro Owners Make

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Macbook Pros are fantastic laptops, but that doesn\u2019t mean they can\u2019t be improved. The Macbook Pro is a computer that has been iterated on for many years now. It is also a computer that has gained popularity for being the go-to laptop for video editors and other professionals who rely on the performance of their computer when it comes to editing video or images, like photographers. This article will go into detail about some of the most common mistakes Macbook Pro owners make with their machine and how you can avoid making these same mistakes yourself if you own one.
With so many different versions of the Macbook Pro available on the market right now, it\u2019s easy to get confused about which features you need as an owner of this device and which ones you don\u2019t. Here are some tips and tricks to keep in mind if you own a Macbook Pro:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
